passiveshield-fabric.duskconfig.title: Passive Shield Config
passiveshield-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_hid: When enabled, the shield will be hidden unless a player presses right-click.
passiveshield-fabric.duskconfig.hideShie: Hide Shield When Not In Use
passiveshield-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_pas: The percentage of damage that will be negated when a player is hit while holding a shield that's not held high.
